timeline.bodyText: Finally:  If you return or throw from a finally, then values returned or thrown from the try-catch block will be ignored. Consider using try-with-resources instead.
timeline.author: sonatype-lift

timeline.bodyText: Finally:  If you return or throw from a finally, then values returned or thrown from the try-catch block will be ignored. Consider using try-with-resources instead.
